titleStmt.title: Historical and political essays or discourses on several subjects viz. money, government, peace, war, trade, arts, navigation, exchange, usury, banks : with other projects for the improvement and raising the credit of money and trade in all parts of the world, but more particularly, relating to England : in a letter to a noble peer.
Discourse of money. 1698
titleStmt.author: Briscoe, John, fl. 1695.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for W. Chandeler ... and T. Scott ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints to Briscoe.

Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
